shorts.title: COLLEGE BASEBALL: Opportunity for local players knocks on wood
shorts.title_distilled: COLLEGE BASEBALL: Opportunity for local players knocks on wood.
shorts.description: SCRANTON — Paul McGloin gets numerous phone calls every May from local college players looking for a place to play during the summer. “They ask, ‘Do you know of anybody who needs somebody?’,” McGloin said. “Something fell through or they were going to go away and decided to change their mind. Or it’s too expensive and they want to stay close to home.” Unfortunately, not many options existed. McGloin sought to change that. He fondly remembers his playing days in the Collegiate Summer Baseball League and the Scranton Association, as well as coaching with the Scranton Red Sox in the […]
shorts.content: SCRANTON — Paul McGloin gets numerous phone calls every May from local college players looking for a place to play during the summer. “They ask, ‘Do you know of anybody who needs somebody?’,” McGloin said. “Something fell through or they were going to go away and decided to change their mind. Or it’s too expensive and they want to stay close to home.” Unfortunately, not many options existed. McGloin sought to change that. He fondly remembers his playing days in the Collegiate Summer Baseball League and the Scranton Association, as well as coaching with the Scranton Red Sox in the […]
shorts.content_distilled: SCRANTON — Paul McGloin gets numerous phone calls every May from local college players looking for a place to play during the summer.

shorts.title: Lepre-Con Pub Crawl donates to Archbald Police Department
shorts.title_distilled: Lepre-Con Pub Crawl donates to Archbald Police Department.
shorts.description: Archbald’s streets welcomed over 180 leprechauns, lads and lassies as they trolled the streets in search of participating taverns in the 2nd Annual Lepre-Con Pub Crawl in March. This gathering, clad in Irish shamrock greens from Tag’d Gift Store, sought to raise funds to purchase two automated external defibrillators for the Archbald Police Department. Moontower Bar and Grill, Bud’s Bar and Grill, Ambrose Revels Legion, Kenny’s Pub, East Side Hose Company and Barrett’s Pub were among the participating taverns, with the Black Diamond Bagpipers captivating the audience at the final stop. The pot of gold was discovered there with $3,738. […]

shorts.title: 91st DREAM GAME: Old Forge’s Rosado inspired to show he belongs among all-stars
shorts.title_distilled: 91st DREAM GAME: Old Forge’s Rosado inspired to show he belongs among all-stars.
shorts.description: OLD FORGE – Richard Rosado got choked up. Head coach Michael Schuback called his name and presented him with the Louis “Guie” Cusumano at the Old Forge football postseason banquet. The award honors the memory of the longtime and devoted supporter of the program who was a co-founder of the Quarterback Club. Rosado, a two-way lineman, couldn’t have been more appreciative for being recognized for his dedication and character. “It filled my heart with joy,” Rosado said. “It just meant a lot to me coming from coach Schuback. He has been guiding me my whole career. I think it showed me […]
